B. Cost of Land, Rights-of-Way, Property Damage, Easements, Razing of
Buildings, Shifting of Railroad Tracks, Etc.

The cost of land, rights-of-way, property damage or easements, razing of
buildings, and shifting of railroad tracks, as herein estimated, includes all
of these items of expense within the limits of the bridge and approaches.

Similar expense, as well as all other costs for the approaches beyond the
limits of the immediate bridge and approaches, herein described, to connect
this crossing with Route No. 40 to the north and with Route No. 1 to the
south, are not herein included.

Total Cost of Land, Rights-of-Way, Property Damage,
Easements, Razing of Buildings, Shifting of Rail-
road Tracks, Ete. ............................. $400,000
